name: Bork (DABUOYS)
description:
Pop a cork and play some Bork! Challenge fisherman "Hook" and defeat him at his own game. Every round is allocated ten seconds to accumulate bounty. Roll and save bounty blocks that are posted on the bounty board to amass your bounty! Collect the highest bounty over the course of 5 Rounds to win.

Credits:

A game by DABUOYS

Programmer: Ethan Kilgore

Artist: Dominick Briggs

Music/Narrative: Michael Amiri
